doc:
Olympia Dukakis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olympia_Dukakis 0 Olympia Dukakis (born June 20, 1931) is a Greek American actress. She started her career in theater, and won an Obie Award for Best Actress in 1963 for her Off-Broadway performance in Bertolt Brecht's Man Equals Man. She later transitioned to film acting, and in 1987, she won an Academy Award, a Golden Globe, and a BAFTA nomination for her performance in Moonstruck. She received another Golden Globe nomination for Sinatra, and Emmy Award nominations for Lucky Day, More Tales of the City, and Joan of Arc. Olympia_Dukakis ( born June_20_,_1931 ) is a_Greek_American_actress . She started her_career in theater , and won an_Obie_Award for_Best_Actress in 1963 for her_Off-Broadway_performance in Bertolt_Brecht 's_Man Equals Man . She later transitioned to film_acting , and in 1987 , she won an_Academy_Award , a_Golden_Globe , and a_BAFTA_nomination for her_performance in Moonstruck . She received another_Golden_Globe_nomination for Sinatra , and Emmy_Award_nominations for Lucky_Day , More_Tales of the_City , and Joan of Arc .
